title: Yemen: Protecting sheep and goats against disease

subtasks: Ensuring grain is loaded safely and efficiently
Ensuring truck bed is clean and free of obstructions
Clearing grain spillage from previous loads
Monitoring grain flow and adjusting as needed
Ensuring no blockages in unloading system

tasks.task: Okay, let's see. The transcript is about operating a combine harvester and handling grain, right?
